markdownRemark.html:
I have been busy the past week through the christmas rush because I am fixing all of my papers for a temporary work permit going to the Cayman Islands. To be honest, I did not expect to get hired this month because it is a busy month here in the Philippines but yeah I guess luck favored my grit again to search and dig through rough situations.

I really forgot that I applied a job Accounting in the Cayman Islands. That is why that when they called, I literally am scratching my head wondering how I got the interview. But yeah, I did pass the interview and got a good deal with them. I intend to stay in Cayman Islands or the next three years (or could be more..).

A fresh start for rebuilding my financial curve again. The universe surely know how to make miracles. I think I can conveniently push to myself to do keto diet and ride bicycles everyday there. Pretty excited of the new challenge.

It’s my third time staying in an island for more than 11 months though..

frontmatter.title: I got hired in Cayman islands..another fresh start
